title: unique, inspirational experience. you either 'get it' or don't
review: it would be unfair to try to describe this film because 'seeing' it will speak for itself. it would be fair to use these adjectives to describe it: beautiful, inspirational, transcending, clever & witty. i really loved the last shot of the film!

title: a rare gem!
review: moving, loving, inspirational, alive, full of hope and humor....spiritual, deep......silence and thoughts.....a gem!
